name: Flight Delay Visual
tagline: Top US 50 airport flight delay visual
body:
This is project 5 for UDacity Data Analyst Nano-degree course. I create a visual to show flight delay information for top 50 US airports.

Here is the [visual] (http://tigerhead.github.io/flightdelayvisual/FlightDelayVisual.html)

This is my initial version. Any feedback are welcome

In particular, I am looking for your thoughts as to the following questions:

1. What do you notice in the visualization?

2. What questions do you have about the data?

3. Is there something you don't understand in the visualization?

4. Do you find any relationships interesting or counter-intuitive?

5. What do you like about the visualization?

6. What do you think I can improve on the visualization? 

Thank you in advance!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
